019package org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.internal;
020
021import static org.apiguardian.api.API.Status.INTERNAL;
022import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.Objects.isNull;
023import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.Objects.nonNull;
024import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.Objects.requireNonNullArgument;
025import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.StringConverter.METHOD_NAME_GetSubjectClass;
026import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.StringConverter.METHOD_NAME_Provider;
027
028import java.lang.reflect.InvocationTargetException;
029import java.util.Collection;
030import java.util.HashMap;
031import java.util.List;
032import java.util.Map;
033import java.util.Optional;
034import java.util.ServiceLoader;
035
036import org.apiguardian.api.API;
037import org.tquadrat.foundation.annotation.ClassVersion;
038import org.tquadrat.foundation.annotation.UtilityClass;
039import org.tquadrat.foundation.exception.PrivateConstructorForStaticClassCalledError;
040import org.tquadrat.foundation.exception.UnexpectedExceptionError;
041import org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.StringConverter;
042
043/**
044 *  The implementation for the
045 *  {@link StringConverter}
046 *  service methods.
047 *
048 *  @extauthor Thomas Thrien - thomas.thrien@tquadrat.org
049 *  @version $Id: StringConverterService.java 897 2021-04-06 21:34:01Z tquadrat $
050 *  @since 0.1.0
051 *
052 *  @UMLGraph.link
053 */
054@ClassVersion( sourceVersion = "$Id: StringConverterService.java 897 2021-04-06 21:34:01Z tquadrat $" )
055@API( status = INTERNAL, since = "0.1.0" )
056@UtilityClass
057public final class StringConverterService
058{
059        /*--------------*\
060    ====** Constructors **=====================================================
061        \*--------------*/
062    /**
063     *  No instance allowed for this class.
064     */
065    private StringConverterService() { throw new PrivateConstructorForStaticClassCalledError( StringConverterService.class ); }
066
067        /*---------*\
068    ====** Methods **==========================================================
069        \*---------*/
070    /**
071     *  Returns the classes for that an instance of {@code StringConverter} is
072     *  registered,
073     *
074     *  @return The classes with a string converter.
075     */
076    @API( status = INTERNAL, since = "0.1.0" )
077    public static final Collection<Class<?>> listInstances()
078    {
079        final var registry = loadConverters();
080        final Collection<Class<?>> retValue = List.copyOf( registry.keySet() );
081
082        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
083        return retValue;
084    }   //  listInstances()
085
086    /**
087     *  Loads the known instances of
088     *  {@link StringConverter}.
089     *
090     *  @return The registry with the converters.
091     */
092    @API( status = INTERNAL, since = "0.1.0" )
093    public static final Map<Class<?>,StringConverter<?>> loadConverters()
094    {
095        final var moduleLayer = StringConverter.class.getModule().getLayer();
096        @SuppressWarnings( "rawtypes" )
097        final var converters = isNull( moduleLayer )
098            ? ServiceLoader.load( StringConverter.class )
099            : ServiceLoader.load( moduleLayer, StringConverter.class );
100
101        final Map<Class<?>,StringConverter<?>> retValue = new HashMap<>();
102
103        for( final StringConverter<?> c : converters )
104        {
105            StringConverter<?> converter;
106            try
107            {
108                final var providerMethod = c.getClass().getMethod( METHOD_NAME_Provider );
109                converter = (StringConverter<?>) providerMethod.invoke( null );
110            }
111            catch( final NoSuchMethodException | IllegalAccessException | InvocationTargetException e )
112            {
113                converter = c;
114            }
115
116            for( final var subjectClass : retrieveSubjectClasses( converter ) )
117            {
118                retValue.put( subjectClass, converter );
119            }
120        }
121
122        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
123        return retValue;
124    }   //  loadConverters()
125
126    /**
127     *  Returns an instance of {@code StringConverter} for the given
128     *  {@link Class}.
129     *  If there is no converter for the given type, or the type is
130     *  {@code null}, the return value is
131     *  {@link Optional#empty()}.
132     *
133     *  @param  <C> The class a converter is needed for.
134     *  @param  type    The instance of the class a converter is needed for.
135     *  @return An instance of
136     *      {@link Optional}
137     *      that holds the instance of {@code StringConverter}.
138     */
139    @API( status = INTERNAL, since = "0.1.0" )
140    public static final <C> Optional<StringConverter<C>> retrieveConverterForClass( final Class<C> type )
141    {
142        StringConverter<?> result = null;
143        if( nonNull( type ) )
144        {
145            final var registry = loadConverters();
146            result = registry.get( type );
147        }
148        @SuppressWarnings( "unchecked" )
149        final var retValue = Optional.ofNullable( (StringConverter<C>) result );
150
151        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
152        return retValue;
153    }   //  retrieveConverterForClass()
154
155    /**
156     *  Returns an instance of {@code StringConverter} for the given
157     *  {@link Enum} type.
158     *  If there is no converter for the given type in the registry, a new
159     *  instance of {@code StringConverter} will be created, on base of
160     *  {@link DefaultEnumStringConverter}.
161     *
162     *  @param  <E> The class a converter is needed for.
163     *  @param  type    The instance of the class a converter is needed for.
164     *  @return The requested instance of {@code StringConverter}.
165     */
166    @API( status = INTERNAL, since = "0.1.0" )
167    public static final <E extends Enum<E>> StringConverter<E> retrieveConverterForEnum( final Class<E> type )
168    {
169        final var retValue = retrieveConverterForClass( requireNonNullArgument( type, "type" ) ).orElseGet( () -> new DefaultEnumStringConverter<>( type ) );
170
171        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
172        return retValue;
173    }   //  retrieveConverterForEnum()
174
175    /**
176     *  Determines the key class for the given instance of
177     *  {@link StringConverter}.
178     *  The subject class is the target type for a call to
179     *  {@link StringConverter#fromString(CharSequence) fromString()},
180     *  and usually this is also the type of the argument for
181     *  {@link StringConverter#toString(Object) toString(T)};
182     *  but under some circumstances, it cannot be guessed correctly by
183     *  reflection. For that case, some implementation of
184     *  {@code StringConverter} provides an optional method
185     *  {@code public Class<?> getSubjectClass()} that returns the respective
186     *  class.
187     *
188      * @param  converter   The converter instance.
189     *  @return The subject class.
190     */
191    @SuppressWarnings( {"NestedTryStatement", "unchecked"} )
192    private static final Collection<Class<?>> retrieveSubjectClasses( final StringConverter<?> converter )
193    {
194        final var converterClass = requireNonNullArgument( converter, "converter" ).getClass();
195        Collection<Class<?>> retValue;
196        try
197        {
198            try
199            {
200                final var getSubjectClassMethod = converterClass.getMethod( METHOD_NAME_GetSubjectClass );
201                retValue = (Collection<Class<?>>) getSubjectClassMethod.invoke( converter );
202            }
203            catch( @SuppressWarnings( "unused" ) final NoSuchMethodException e )
204            {
205                final var fromStringMethod = converterClass.getMethod( "fromString", CharSequence.class );
206                retValue = List.of( fromStringMethod.getReturnType() );
207            }
208        }
209        catch( final NoSuchMethodException | SecurityException | IllegalAccessException | InvocationTargetException e )
210        {
211            throw new UnexpectedExceptionError( e );
212        }
213
214        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
215        return retValue;
216    }   //  retrieveSubjectClass()
217}
218//  class StringConverterService
219
220/*
221 *  End of File
222 */
